tweet.text: Powell returned to public service during the George W. Bush administration. On January 26, 2001, Powell was sworn in as the 65th Secretary of State of the United States, as his wife Alma looked on. Powell served as the first Black American in this role. 📷 @USNatArchives https://t.co/DWab2yBeBD
